title: Relax in Style at Residence Vive La Vie in Franschhoek
description: Spacious suites, grand gardens and attentive service await at Residence Vive La Vie, a peaceful self-catering guesthouse in the heart of Franschhoek.

title: Sumptuous Seclusion at This Luxe-Country Franschhoek Villa
description: Surrounded by a tranquil garden on the edge of Le Lude estate in Franschhoek, Lily Pond House is the stuff of hideaway fantasies.
